phrs.translation: n. 奥斯卡金像奖（著名电影奖项）

sentences.sentence: The Oscars race will enter the homestretch after this weekend.
sentences.translation: 奥斯卡比赛本周之后将进入最后阶段。

sentences.sentence: You'll live in a big house in Hollywood, go to the Oscars every year—and win! You'll be rich and famous.
sentences.translation: 你会住在好莱坞的大房子里，每年都去奥斯卡捧得奖杯！你会有钱又出名。

sentences.sentence: The Iron Lady, in which Meryl Streep played the role of former British Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher, won her the best leading actress of this year's Academy Awards(Oscars).
sentences.translation: 梅丽尔·斯特里普在《铁娘子》中饰演英国前首相玛格丽特·撒切尔夫人，她赢得了今年奥斯卡最佳女主角奖。
